seesaw.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a piece of equipment that children play on, made of a board that is balanced in the middle, so that when one end goes up the other goes down
seesaw.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a repeated movement from one state or condition to another and back again
seesaw.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to keep changing from one state or condition to another and back again
seesaw.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Before the election, the president seesawed in the polls.
